column1: Métropole Rouen Normandie is the métropole
column3: centred on the city of Rouen. It is located in the Seine-Maritime department
column5: north-western France. It was created in January 2015
column6: replacing the previous Communauté d'agglomération Rouen-Elbeuf-Austreberthe. Its population was 499

column1: The Agglomeration community of Rouen-Elbeuf-Austreberthe (French: Communauté d'agglomération Rouen-Elbeuf-Austreberthe) was created in 2010. On January 1
column3: the Metropolis replaced the agglomeration community in accordance with a law of January 2014.

column1: The goal of the Métropole is to build a better metropolitan area by synchronizing the transport system
